en.title: FusionExcel Taking off in India!
en.content:
REPORT BY FE DIRECTOR/STOCKIST DR DIPAK BANGA.

We feel immensely proud to share this wonderful achievement of Indian members of FusionExcel who are conducting lots of activities with the support of Presidential Directors Dato Dr Barani Karunakaran and Uncle Karuna in India.

The event conducted on 13th June 2009 at Hotel Raviraj, Pune, Maharashtra was a great success!

This event was organized by FE Directors Manish Gupta, Dr Dipak Bangar (Stockiest), Vivek Bavishkar (Stockiest) and new enthusiastic Stockist Dilip Dhami. The event was attended by over 70 FE Leaders, Members and Invited Guests. Dr Dipak Bangar MBBS explained in simple language about Scalar Energy and it's health benefits and the need for FE's Quantum Pendant in the 21st century. The attendees were immensely impressed with demos conducted by Dr Dipak, especially the 'mobile phone test' and the 'strength test'. 

Mr Manish Gupta explained regarding today's financial reality and the need to start FE business as a vehicle to fulfill those dreams which everyone of us just thinks of! 

We would like to thank our up line mentors PD Dr Barani and his father PD Uncle Karuna who have been supporting us in India for 1 year. 

This event is a great start to build a huge potential market like India and we are sure we are going to BOOM India!!

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
